RetrivePDB module¶

class RetrivePDB.MPWrapper(downloadPath, processes=3, maxSleep=3, ftpSite='RCSB', format='mmCIF')¶

Bases: object

Multiprocessing wrapper for RetrivePDB

When there is a large number of PDB files to download, this class is helpful. But Need to be careful with the numbers of processes and the time of sleep.

Script:

1
2
3
4
5
6
7
pdbs = ['1A02', '3KBZ', '3KC0', '3KC1', '3KMU', '3KMW', '3KYC', '3KYD', ...]
mpw = MPWrapper("C:/Users/Nature/Downloads/")
# fail = mpw.http_retrive(pdbs)
# fail = mpw.http_retrive(pdbs, module="urllib")
# fail = mpw.ftp_retrive_wget(pdbs)
fail = mpw.ftp_retrive_batch(pdbs)
printList(fail)
Parameters

  • downloadPath (str) – File folder of Downloaded PDB files

  • processes (int) – Number of processes, default value: 3

  • maxSleep (int) – Max sleep time, default value: 3

  • ftpSite (str) – The FTP site of retriving PDB files, default value: RCSB, {RCSB, PDBE, PDBJ}

  • format (str) – The file format of PDB file, default value: mmCIF, {mmCIF, pdb, XML}

ftp_retrive_batch(pdbs, remove=True, chunksize=100)¶

Retrive PDB files via FTP Connection

Parameters

  • pdbs (Iterable or Iterator) – An object containing the PDB ids that need to be download

  • remove (bool) – whether remove the compressed file, default value: True

  • chunksize (int) – the size of PDBs that query during a single FTP connection, default value: 100

Returns

A fail list that contains the PDB ids falied to download

Return type

list(str)

ftp_retrive_wget(pdbs, remove=True)¶

Download PDB file via FTP with wget

Parameters

  • pdbs (Iterable or Iterator) – An object containing the PDB ids that need to be download

  • remove (bool) – whether remove the compressed file, default value: True

Returns

A fail list that contains the PDB ids falied to download

Return type

list(str)

http_retrive(pdbs, module='wget', view=False, bioAssembly='', extension='.gz', remove=True)¶

Retrive PDB file via http with wget.download or urllib.request.urlopen

HTTP SITE: RCSB ONLY

Parameters

  • pdbs (Iterable or Iterator) – An object containing the PDB ids that need to be download

  • module (str) – For user to select the module, default value: wget, {“wget”, “urllib”}

  • view (bool) – Whether get the PDB data from the web pages, default value: False

  • bioAssembly (str) – The bioAssembly id, default value: ‘’

  • extension (str) – Compressed file tail, default value: .gz

  • remove (bool) – whether remove the compressed file, default value: True

Returns

A fail list that contains the PDB ids falied to download

Return type

list(str)

setProcesses(processes, maxSleep)¶

Set the value of processes and maxSleep

Parameters

  • processes (int) – Number of processes

  • maxSleep (int) – Max sleep time

class RetrivePDB.RetrivePDB(downloadPath, pdbs=None, ftpSite='PDBE', format='mmCIF')¶

Bases: object

Retrive PDB File

Script:

1
2
3
4
5
6
ftpPDB = RetrivePDB("C:/Users/Nature/Downloads/PDBE/", ftpSite="PDBE", format="pdb")
ftpPDB.ftp_retrive(pdbs=['10z1', '10z2', '2xyn', '10z3'], remove=True)
print(ftpPDB)
printList(ftpPDB.getFail())
ftpPDB.quick_ftp_retrive('5js8', remove=False)
ftpPDB.quick_http_retrive('5js1', module="urllib", view=False, bioAssembly=1, remove=True)

decompression(path, extension='.gz', remove=True, outputPath=None)¶

Decompress gz file

Parameters

  • path (str) – The file path of the compressed file

  • extension (str) – Compressed file tail, default value: .gz

  • remove (bool) – Whether remove the compressed file, default value: True

  • outputPath (str) – File safe path, default value: None

ftp_retrive(**kwargs)¶

Retrive PDB files via FTP Connection

Parameters

  • pdbs (Iterable or Iterator or str) – single PDB id or PDB ids

  • remove (bool) – whether remove the compressed file, default value: True

getFail()¶

Get the list of PDB ids that failed to fetch files

quick_ftp_retrive(pdb, remove=True)¶

Download PDB file via FTP with wget

Download only one file at a time

Parameters

  • pdb (str) – single PDB id

  • remove (bool) – whether remove the compressed file, default value: True

quick_http_retrive(pdb, module='wget', view=False, bioAssembly='', extension='.gz', remove=True)¶

Download PDB file via HTTP with wget.download or urllib.request.urlopen

RCSB Only

Parameters

  • pdb (str) – single PDB id

  • module (str) – For user to select the module, default value: wget, {“wget”, “urllib”}

  • view (bool) – Whether get the PDB data from the web pages

  • bioAssembly (str) – The bioAssembly id, default value: ‘’

  • extension (str) – Compressed file tail, default value: .gz

  • remove (bool) – whether remove the compressed file, default value: True

Set the value of PDB file download path

Set the value of PDB FTP site

Parameters

ftpSite (str) – The FTP site of retriving PDB files, default value: RCSB, {RCSB, PDBE, PDBJ}

setFormat(format)¶

Set the format of PDB file

Parameters

format (str) – The file format of PDB file, default value: mmCIF, {mmCIF, pdb, XML}

Set the value of PDB id(s)

Parameters

  • Iterable, Iterator: PDB ids
